attributes.action: Remove MPs expenses. And Reinstate kids school meals
attributes.background: Remove all MPs expenses. Only the  prime Minister should receive expenses.  Reinstate school meals for the most vulnerable of our children.we the taxpayer demand our money to be spent on children not MPs expenses.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You could start a new petition about reversing changes to free school meals, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
